name: com.unity.xr.arcore
description:
Provides native Google ARCore integration for use with Unity's multi-platform XR API.
Supports the following features:
-Efficient Background Rendering
-Horizontal Planes
-Depth Data
-Anchors
-Hit Testing
-Occlusion

_upm.changelog:
### Changed

- macOS binaries are now code signed.
- Changed AR Foundation dependency version from 6.5.0-pre.1 to 6.5.0-pre.2.
